message.content: {"id": "7330", "title": "Make more actions available on text selection", "description": "I could not find the action 'Add Javadoc Comment' until I switched to the Outline view. Currently, the actions are distributed on a personal taste basis. This should be changed. It is not clear to users why some actions are in the context menu and some are not (not all need to be in the context menu but all must be reachable from the editor, e.g., via the Edit menu).", "OB": "The action 'Add Javadoc Comment' is not available on text selection.", "EB": "The action 'Add Javadoc Comment' should be made available on text selection.", "SR": "All actions should be reachable from the editor, including 'Add Javadoc Comment', which could be added to the Edit menu."}

origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '7330', 'title': 'Bug 7330Make more actions available on text selection', 'description': 'Bug 7330Make more actions available on text selection I could not find the action "Add Javadoc Comment" until I switched to theOutline view. in the Edit (or some other global) menuI think currently we distribute the actions on a personal taste basis. Thisshould be changed. It is not clear to users why some actions are in the contextmenu and some are not (OKnot all need to be in the context menu but all mustbe reachable from the editor e.g. It is not acceptable to forceusers to switch the view. ', 'OB': '', 'EB': '', 'SR': 'via Edit menu). '}
